revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: (1st hand) [Year . . . of Imperator Caesar] Marcus Aurelius [Severus] Alexander Pius Felix Augustus, Phamenoth 10(?).;(2nd hand) [To - - -] and Chairemon alias Sarapodoros, [keepers of the register of property for the] Arsinoite nome, [from Aurelius - - -, son of - - -], a minor, of the district [- - -, with as guardian] Aurelius Sarapion, son of Eudaimon. [I register the halve share, common] and undivided, of a house [and a courtyard(?) and a] collapsed [- - - which I bought under a transaction] transacted through the archives [here - - -] in the metropolis in the district [- - -], the price [being - - -] silver [drachmai - - -]

listBibl.bibl: Sijpesteijn PJ, ZPE 106, 228-229, 1995, Pl. IXd -- SB XXII, 15793
